name: HoloLibrary - The 3D Encyclopedia
blurb: Imagine an encyclopedia where you can experience history and science through a fully immersive 3D simulation.

rewards.reward: WRITE YOUR NAME ON THE MOON: We will write your name or the name of a loved one in the dirt on the 3D moon in our "1969 Moon Landing" simulation.  This is included with all rewards over $10.  You\u2019ll also receive a sincere thank you from the HoloLibrary team and an invitation to join our email list so you can monitor our progress.\r\n(Delivered upon project completion)

POSTER + YOUR NAME ON THE MOON: Receive a limited edition HoloLibrary poster available only through our kickstarter campaign, and have your or a loved one\u2019s name written in the dirt on the 3D moon in our \u201c1969 Moon Landing\u201d simulation.

SIGNED POSTER + YOUR NAME ON THE MOON: Receive a limited edition poster with a handwritten thank-you note from the HoloLibrary team, and have your or a loved one\u2019s name written in the dirt on the 3D moon in our \u201c1969 Moon Landing\u201d simulation.

EARLY BIRD 4GB USB LIBRARY CARD:  We\u2019ll preload the first 5 HoloLibrary simulations onto a sleek credit card sized 4GB USB drive so you can take the HoloLibrary anywhere or use the extra storage space if you ever need it\u2026 a 3D library that fits in your wallet.  We\u2019ll also write your or a loved one\u2019s name in the dirt on the 3D moon in our \u201c1969 Moon Landing\u201d simulation. (Library Card shipped upon project completion)

T-SHIRT + YOUR NAME ON THE MOON: Receive a limited edition Socrates rockstar t-shirt with the HoloLibrary insignia, and your or a loved one\u2019s name written in the dirt on the 3D moon in our \u201c1969 Moon Landing\u201d simulation. (Please add $15 for international shipping).

4GB USB LIBRARY CARD + YOUR NAME ON THE MOON:  We\u2019ll preload the first 5 HoloLibrary simulations onto a sleek credit card sized 4GB USB drive so you can take the HoloLibrary anywhere or use the extra storage space if you ever need it. A 3D library that fits in your wallet. We\u2019ll also write your name or the name of a loved one in the dirt on the 3D moon in our \u201c1969 Moon Landing\u201d simulation.

4GB USB LIBRARY CARD + SIGNED POSTER + YOUR NAME ON THE MOON: You get the 4GB credit card USB drive preloaded with the first 5 simulations and the limited edition HoloLibrary poster signed with a thank you note from the HoloLibrary team and we\u2019ll write your name of the name of a loved one in the dirt on the moon.

4GB USB LIBRARY CARD + POSTER + T-SHIRT + YOUR NAME ON THE MOON: You get the 4GB credit card USB drive with the first 5 HoloLibrary simulations, the limited edition HoloLibrary poster, and an out of this world Socrates rockstar t-shirt with the HoloLibrary insignia, and your name or the name of a loved one in the dirt in the moon landing simulation.

LIMITED EDITION SOCRATES T-SHIRT + 4GB USB LIBRARY CARD:  You\u2019ll receive a one of a kind School of HoloLibrary t-shirt, our mash up of Rafael\u2019s \u201cSchool of Athens\u201d from the Vatican Museum.  You\u2019ll also receive the 4GB HoloLibrary Card and your name or the name of a loved one written in the dirt in the moon landing simulation.

VOTE + 8GB USB LIBRARY CARD + T-SHIRT: We are building a big list on our website composed of our future projects. Anyone who donates $100 or more will be able to vote on the order of items on that list. Includes an 8GB USB HoloLibrary Card and our limited edition t-shirt. (Please add $15 for international shipping)

VOTE + 1TB HARD DRIVE DEVELOPER\u2019S KIT:  With developers and 3D experts in mind, we\u2019ll send you a 1TB Hard Drive loaded with all the HoloLibrary catalog\u2019s raw and uncut animations, 3D models, sound effects, videos, and more.  You\u2019ll get a welcome and thank you video from the founders, a complete starter kit for developers who are interested in collaborating on future simulations or just want to see how our process works, guides on how to start making content for the Oculus Rift, and more.  You\u2019ll also get 1 vote to move a project up on the future projects list, and your name or name of a loved one on the moon. \r\n(Hard Drive delivered upon project completion)

VOTE + 1TB DEVELOPER\u2019S KIT + 3 T-SHIRTS + 5 SIGNED POSTERS:  You\u2019ll receive the 1TB hard drive developer\u2019s kit, the Socrates rockstar OR the School of Athens t-shirt, 5 signed posters, 3 t-shirts, a vote on the list of future projects, and your name or name of a loved one on the moon. \r\n(Hard Drive delivered upon project completion)

VOTE + 1TB DEVELOPER\u2019S KIT + 5x 4GB USB LIBRARY CARDS + 5 SHIRTS + 10 POSTERS + 5 NAMES ON THE MOON: You\u2019ll receive a vote on the list of future simulations for up to 5 people, the developer\u2019s kit, 5 preloaded USB library cards, and 5 names written in the sand in the \u201c1969 Moon Landing\u201d simulation.

(EARLY BIRD) CONTRIBUTOR'S PACKAGE:  You will get to contribute 2 3D simulation project of your choosing to our big queue of upcoming educational 3D simulations.  Are you an art historian? A biologist? A Yankees fan?  Maybe you\u2019d like to experience Notre Dame during its construction, or take a tour of the Extinct Zoo, or re-create an historic Yankees game.  Your name will appear as \u201cOriginally Inspired By\u201d on the simulation\u2019s main page and credits.  You\u2019ll also receive 10 t-shirts, 10 posters, and 10 names written on the 3D moon in our \u201c1969 Moon Landing\u201d simulation.

CONTRIBUTOR'S PACKAGE: ADD A NEW PROJECT TO THE LIST + 10 T-SHIRTS + 10 POSTERS + 10 NAMES ON THE MOON:  You will get to add a 3D simulation project of your choosing to our big queue of upcoming educational 3D scenarios.  Are you an art historian? A biologist? A Yankees fan?  Maybe you\u2019d like to experience Notre Dame during its construction, or take a tour of the Extinct Zoo, or re-create an historic Yankees game.  Your name will appear as \u201cOriginally Inspired By\u201d on the simulation\u2019s main page and credits.  You\u2019ll also receive 10 t-shirts, 10 posters, and 10 names written on the 3D moon in our \u201c1969 Moon Landing\u201d simulation.  (Please add $20 for international shipping)

ADD 5 NEW PROJECTS TO THE LIST + VIDEO CONFERENCE + GOODIES:  We welcome you to add the next 5 educational 3D simulations to our queue of upcoming projects and we\u2019ll video conference with you while we brainstorm your 5 ideas, get your thoughts on the project, and how you see the HoloLibrary working in education.  We\u2019ll also send you up to 10 t-shirts and posters, and you\u2019ll get to write the names of up to 10 people in the dirt on the moon in our \u201c1969 Moon Landing\u201d simulation.

YOUR NEW PROJECT GOES TO THE TOP OF THE LIST + VIDEO CONFERENCE + GOODIES:  Your idea for a project goes to the TOP of the list.  We will begin work on your simulation immediately and it will be released as part of the first set of 5 simulations marked for completion around December 2014.  You name, company\u2019s name, and/or logo will appear in big letters as \u201cSponsored By\u201d on the simulation\u2019s main page and credits.  We\u2019ll have a video conference with you where we can brainstorm the simulation and get your thoughts and recommendations for getting the HoloLibrary into classrooms worldwide.  We\u2019ll also send you up to 10 t-shirts and posters, and you\u2019ll get to write the name of up to 10 people in the dirt on the 3D moon in our \u201c1969 Moon Landing\u201d simulation.  Basically at this level of contribution, don\u2019t feel shy about asking one of us for a kidney.
